Wallace: Lionel Atwill. Mrs. Peabody: Lucille Gleason. Mrs. Hopkins: Mary Boland. Excellent cast. Jack Conway directed.

programme.title: The Secret of Dr. Kildare
programme.desc: In the third entry in the series, Dr. Kildare's overworked mentor takes a much-needed vacation, so the young physician takes over the case of a young lady suffering from psychosomatic blindness.

programme.title: Murder Man
programme.desc: Tale of an alcoholic reporter (Spencer Tracy) covering the murder of a businessman. Mary: Virginia Bruce. Cole: Lionel Atwill. Mander: Harvey Stephens. Robins: Robert Barrat. Shorty: James Stewart. Carey: Bobby Watson. Pop: William Collier Sr. Buck: Fuzzy Knight. Lilian: Louise Henry. Tim Whelan directed.

programme.title: The Age of Innocence
programme.desc: Story about a repressed romance between 19th-century New York socialites, one of whom is engaged and the other newly divorced.

programme.title: The Secret of Madame Blanche
programme.desc: Tale of love, deception and sacrifice in 1900s France. Irene Dunne, Phillips Holmes, Lionel Atwill, Una Merkel. Attorney: C. Henry Gordon. Leonard Jr.: Douglas Walton. Eloise: Jean Parker. Charles Brabin directed.

programme.title: The Devil Is a Woman
programme.desc: Marlene Dietrich at her most glamorous as Concha, collector of hearts. Directed in high style by Josef von Sternberg. Lionel Atwill, Cesar Romero, Edward Everett Horton. Radiantly set at a Spanish carnival.

programme.title: Captain Blood
programme.desc: Swashbuckling saga about a 17th-century Irish doctor who's unjustly charged with treason and sent to Jamaica, where he's sold into slavery, but when pirates attack the island, he and fellow prisoners escape, commandeer a Spanish galleon and set sail on the high seas. This Best Picture nominee made Errol Flynn a star, and is one of nine films he made with director Michael Curtiz.

programme.title: The Mystery of the Wax Museum
programme.desc: Chiller about a maniac who uses wax-coated bodies for his displays. Lionel Atwill, Fay Wray, Glenda Farrell, Frank McHugh. Ralph: Allen Vincent. Harold: Gavin Gordon. Dr. Rasmussen: Holmes Herbert. Joe: Edwin Maxwell. Sparrow: Arthur Edmund Carewe. Michael Curtiz directed.

programme.title: Doctor X
programme.desc: A newspaperman investigates a wave of full-moon murders that have a cannibalistic bite to them.

programme.title: Absolute Quiet
programme.desc: A financer, a corrupt governor and others are held hostage on a ranch by escaped convicts.

programme.title: The Vampire Bat
programme.desc: When corpses drained of blood appear in a village, town elders suspect a vampire is on the loose. Policeman Karl Brettschneider doubts the existence of vampires, but Dr. Otto von Niemann argues to the contrary. Fingers point at the village idiot, Herman Gleib, but after local vigilantes get him out of the picture, the killings continue. Brettschneider tries to keep a cool head as he searches for possibly supernatural answers.

programme.title: Mark of the Vampire
programme.desc: Tod Browning directed this remake of his 1927 silent thriller "London After Midnight," but moved the action to a remote Middle European village, where strange evils stalk the inhabitants and a police inspector teams with an occult expert to investigate.

programme.title: The Gorilla
programme.desc: When a simian escapes a zoo, a series of murders occur and a lawyer fears he is next, so he hires detectives to protect him.

programme.title: The First Traveling Saleslady
programme.desc: The comic adventures of corset-selling ladies who go to Texas at the turn of the century. Ginger Rogers, Carol Channing. Masters: Barry Nelson. Carter: David Brian. Kingdom: James Arness. Cal: Robert Simon. Rice: Clint Eastwood. Directed by Arthur Lubin.

programme.title: Lafayette Escadrille
programme.desc: WWI saga of the American flying unit of the French Air Corps. Tab Hunter. Renee: Etchika Choureau. Drillmaster: Marcel Dalio. Tom: Jody McCrea. Duke: David Janssen. Bill: Bill Wellman Jr. Outstanding aerial photography. Directed by William A. Wellman.

programme.title: Every Which Way But Loose
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in a farce about a brawling trucker, a singer (Sondra Locke) and a beer-guzzling orangutan. Orville: Geoffrey Lewis. Echo: Beverly D'Angelo. Ma: Ruth Gordon. Tank: Walter Barnes. Clerk at DMV: George Chandler. Woody: Roy Jenson. Directed by James Fargo.

programme.title: A Fistful of Dollars
programme.desc: A deadly man with no name arrives in an Old West town ravaged by the brutal feud between two rival factions, and amid the deadly fray, comes up with a scheme to play the two sides perfectly and get rich in the process.

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More
programme.desc: Two rival bounty hunters unite to track a sadistic outlaw and his gang, and fight for survival in the desert. (repeat).

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: Sergio Leone's finale in the Man With No Name trilogy centers on the taciturn, enigmatic loner trying to beat his rivals, a ruthless bounty hunter and a Mexican bandit, to a cache of hidden gold.

programme.title: Hang 'em High
programme.desc: A rancher survives a vicious attack by a lynch mob who accused him of stealing cattle, and he sets out for revenge by becoming a deputy marshal and agreeing to bring in alive the men he is looking for so they can face trials.(n)

programme.title: Coogan's Bluff
programme.desc: A deputy sheriff seeks a fugitive killer in NYC while romancing a pretty probation officer. When the apprehended killer makes a daring escape, the real chase begins.(n)

programme.title: Where Eagles Dare
programme.desc: Allied soldiers disguised as Nazi officers infiltrate a seemingly impenetrable mountaintop castle in the Bavarian Alps to rescue a captured American general who knows the plans for D-Day.(n)

programme.title: Kelly's Heroes
programme.desc: World War II heist actioner with Clint Eastwood sneaking a motley trio of fellow U.S. soldiers behind enemy lines to retrieve a fortune in Nazi gold bullion. Don Rickles and Donald Sutherland provide comic relief.(n)

programme.title: Morning Glory
programme.desc: In her first Oscar-winning performance, Katharine Hepburn plays an aspiring actress trying to get a start in the Broadway theater, where she engages in an affair with a producer, while being loved from afar by a reserved playwright.(n)

programme.title: Song of Love
programme.desc: Set in 1840s Germany, composer Robert Schumann's wife, Clara, deals with his failing mental and physical health, and the rejection of his ambitious operatic works.(n)

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Four sisters come of age during the American Civil War under the guidance of their mother, as their father is absent, ministering to the troops.(n)

programme.title: Mary of Scotland
programme.desc: John Ford's account of 16th-century court intrigue and politics involving Mary Stuart, Queen of Scotland, and the rivalry with her British cousin, Elizabeth Tudor, for the English throne.(n)

programme.title: The Philadelphia Story
programme.desc: In this Best Picture nominee, Katharine Hepburn re-creates her Broadway role as a divorced society woman preparing for her wedding while fending off the advances of a magazine reporter and her ex-husband. Playwright Philip Barry's comedy of manners captures "the privileged class enjoying its privileges" and landed Donald Ogden Stewart a Best Screenplay Oscar and James Stewart a Best Actor award as the journalist. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Suddenly, Last Summer
programme.desc: A society matron offers a New Orleans brain surgeon a million-dollar grant on the condition that he lobotomize her niece, who witnessed the murder of her cousin, the matron's son, the previous summer and who has been institutionalized ever since.(n)

programme.title: Pat and Mike
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy-Katharine Hepburn romp about a likable but unscrupulous sports promoter who helps a female golfer overcome her nervousness during competitions, and the two fall for each other while also dealing with some shady gamblers. Ruth Gordon and Garson Kanin's script was Oscar-nominated.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: An orphan named Ella is treated cruelly by her stepmother and stepsisters, who force her to do menial chores. However, her life changes forever when she meets a prince. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent transforms from virtuous to villainous after humans pillage her serene forest kingdom. She curses the infant daughter of the family who invaded her home, but later discovers that the child possesses the power to restore peace to the land. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: A vacationing family return home to find a supposed squatter dead in their daughter's bed, and the ensuring murder probe unearths a million-dollar heist. Meanwhile, Castle tries to hide an article from Beckett that suggests the two are an item. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: A popular former pro baseball player is murdered after traveling to Cuba on a goodwill mission. Meanwhile, Alexis' genealogy project has Castle thinking about the father he never knew. MLB manager Joe Torre appears as himself. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: A woman's body is found hanging from bondage cuffs and covered in caramel sauce. The investigation leads Beckett and Castle into New York's sexual-domination scene. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. Beckett and Castle work with a skilled federal agent (Dana Delany) to track down a clever serial killer. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Conclusion. Castle and Beckett work with the FBI to find a clever serial killer. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A slain fashion-company owner puts detectives in the path of a photographer (Jeremy Beiler) who points them toward a Web site marred by threatening posts. Sid Maxwell: Rene Ifrah. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives Lupo and Bernard find suitcases full of cash and drugs while investigating the murder of a rich young woman, and security-camera footage leads them to a drug cartel. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters individually battle the same demon on three separate occasions, with each confrontation ending in apparent victory---until the demon reappears at the manor, ready to fight. Meanwhile, Piper announces that she and Leo plan to move out and get their own apartment. Prue: Shannen Doherty. Piper: Holly Marie Combs. Leo: Brian Krause. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Leo and the Halliwell sisters are each infected with one of the seven deadly sins after a demon attacks them with glowing orbs that contain the evil desires. Phoebe is the first to react to the wicked impulses, and her actions jeopardize her academic career. Leo: Brian Krause. Phoebe: Alyssa Milano. Prue: Shannen Doherty. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Charmed
programme.sub-title: The Demon Who Came in From the Cold
programme.desc: Cole learns that the Brotherhood, an elite demonic group of which he was a member, is murdering street prophets to protect a secret plan involving a computer company, so he goes undercover as Belthazor to infiltrate the organization. Cole: Julian McMahon. Leo: Brian Krause. Phoebe: Alyssa Milano. Piper: Shannen Doherty. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: The brothers hunt a shape-shifter, a creature that can transform into other people, after it takes the form of one of Sam's old college friends and frames him for murdering his girlfriend. Rebecca: Amy Grabow. Alex: Peter Shinkoda. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: The brothers hunt the "Hook Man," a spirit with a hook for a hand, after the creature kills a frat boy while he's in a car with his date (Jane McGregor). Rich: Jesse Hutch. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean investigate a town that's plagued by killer insects and discover that the area's new housing development is being built on sacred Native American land. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: The brothers head to their childhood home in Kansas after Sam has a premonition that the family now living there is in danger of being attacked by a paranormal entity. Psychic: Loretta Devine. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A murder victim made himself few friends by being overly honest, and team members find out why when they begin being more honest with each other. Meanwhile, Angela urges Hodgins to deal with the fact that she's pregnant. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team wonders if a recent murder may have been committed by a teenage, hearing-impaired Jane Doe, who was found in the streets while covered in blood and holding a knife. Meanwhile, Angela tries to keep new details of her pregnancy a secret from Hodgins. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth puts all his energy into apprehending Jacob Broadsky (Arnold Vosloo) after an innocent victim is hit by the sniper's bullet---that was meant for Booth. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Agent Pride opens his bar to the public with a Fat Tuesday party, but the event is cut short when he and Mayor Hamilton are kidnapped and held hostage by an unknown assailant. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A mysterious man saves a lieutenant's life and disappears from the scene, but the NCIS team soon discover forensic evidence that suggests he's a soldier who was captured in Afghanistan and never found. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team tracks stolen Navy TNT to a warehouse, where they discover a domestic drug ring led by Sonja's childhood friend that's producing their own cocaine. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mission Impossible III
programme.desc: In the third installment in the "Mission: Impossible" series, retired superspy Ethan Hunt is called back into action to battle a ruthless arms dealer. (cc).

programme.title: The Fifth Element

programme.desc: Gianna Toboni reports on capital punishment in the U.S. and follows one death-row inmate on his path to the execution chamber; Isobel Yeung travels to Yemen to interview women who are finding surprising ways to rise above terrorism, civil war and famine, and transcend their traditional roles in the country's conservative society. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: Two strangers embark on a dangerous trek to safety after their chartered flight crashes on a remote snowy mountain in Utah. Along the way, the pair begin to develop feelings for each other as they try to stay alive and get back to civilization. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: In this gothic romance set in 19th-century England, a young man falls for his alluring and secretive cousin Rachel, despite his suspicions that she murdered his guardian after altering the latter's will—or that she might be targeting him next. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Remittance
programme.desc: A disenchanted Filipino cruise worker is stuck in the monotony of cleaning rooms. Missing her son at home in the Philippines, she learns that he has been admitted to the hospital. Unable to contact him, her world falls to pieces as she deals with the agony of being apart. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: An Eastern European man is forced to live at JFK Airport after his visa is canceled due to a coup in his own country. In time, the terminal becomes a virtual country within itself, complete with culture, ambition, status, diversity and the need for love. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Snowman
programme.desc: Norwegian police detective Harry Hole hunts a terrifying adversary known as "the Snowman Killer." Hole and a rookie cop investigate cold cases in the hope of nabbing the killer, but they soon resort to more-desperate measures to catch their prey. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: From Hell
programme.desc: Johnny Depp plays an opium-addicted inspector who uses his clairvoyant powers to try to track down Jack the Ripper in 19th-century London. Heather Graham, Ian Holm, Ian Richardson, Robbie Coltrane, Lesley Sharp. Directed by Albert and Allen Hughes. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers The Spy Who Shagged Me
programme.desc: The series' second entry sends Austin Powers, the international man of mystery, zipping back in time to 1969 with his new sidekick, Felicity Shagwell, where nefarious Dr. Evil has stolen his "mojo," the life force that makes him a swinging ladies' man. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: San Francisco 2.0
programme.desc: Filmmaker Alexandra Pelosi returns to the city of her birth to examine the effects of the technology industry on San Francisco's culture, identity, real-estate market, economy, neighborhoods and history, and discusses its past, present and future with politicians, entrepreneurs, journalists, small-business owners and lifelong residents. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Shine *
programme.desc: Geoffrey Rush won an Oscar for his portrayal of piano prodigy David Helfgott, whose domineering father (Armin Mueller-Stahl) caused him to have a mental breakdown. David (teen): Noah Taylor. Gillian: Lynn Redgrave. Prof. Parkes: John Gielgud. Directed by Scott Hicks. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Romeo and Juliet A Love Song
programme.desc: (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Orphan
programme.desc: A seemingly angelic orphan named Esther exhibits an unforeseen devilish streak shortly after arriving at her new home. Devastated by a recent miscarriage, aspiring parents John and Kate decide to adopt 9-year-old Esther. But once she's welcomed into their family, she begins to display some deeply unsettling behavior. As tragedy looms, John and Kate race to convince everyone else that Esther is pure evil. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Kingsman The Golden Circle
programme.desc: Kingsman is faced with the challenge of operating with no home base after an evil corporation known as the Golden Circle destroys their headquarters. The elite group of spies must team up with an allied organization called Statesman to save the world. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Girls Trip
programme.desc: Four gal pals decide they need to take a vacation together after five years apart, and head to New Orleans to have a wild time at the Essence Festival. There, they party hard while confronting their personal issues and romantic dilemmas. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.sub-title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver 130
programme.desc: The crisis in Venezuela; and Michael Cohen's consulting payments are discussed. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: In this '80s-set thriller based on a true story, airline pilot Barry Seal is recruited by the CIA to smuggle drugs and weapons abroad for the U.S. government. However, Seal gets in over his head when he becomes involved with Colombia's Medellín cartel and the Iran-contra scandal. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.desc: Suffering from writer's block, an unstable author is accused of plagiarism. (cc).

programme.desc: Eli roams a postapocalyptic world, protecting a sacred tome that offers guidance on how to rebuild humanity. The evil Carnegie goes to great lengths to acquire the powerful book, but Carnegie's adopted daughter, who wants to escape her dad's clutches, helps Eli. (cc).

programme.title: The American President
programme.desc: President Andrew Shepherd, an unabashedly liberal Democrat, is just gearing up for re-election when he meets an attractive and sharp environmental lobbyist named Sydney Wade and the pair fall in love. programme.title: The Layover

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: When a team of hijackers take over an airplane in an attempt to steal a stash of diamonds, two passengers—an FBI agent and an expert thief—work together to foil their plot. (cc).

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: This biopic of airline pilot Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger depicts his successful emergency landing of an Airbus A320 on the Hudson River in January 2009. programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.(c)

programme.title: Dzień dobry
programme.desc: Poranne pasmo muzyczne, w którym prezentowane są najlepsze teledyski artystów cieszących się dużą popularnością.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia

programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Mobmania
programme.desc: Program o nowinkach technicznych. Autorzy przedstawiają najnowsze gadżety, smartfony itp.

programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.(n)

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Mobmania
programme.desc: Program o nowinkach technicznych. Autorzy przedstawiają najnowsze gadżety, smartfony itp.

programme.title: Będę grał w grę
programme.desc: Magazyn skierowany do miłośników gier komputerowych. Jego autorzy omawiają i testują najnowsze propozycje, które trafiają na rynek.

Later, it's the saddest day of SpongeBob's life when he refrains from laughing for 24 hours after Squidward informs him that his “laugh box” is in danger of burning out from overuse. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger fakes emergencies for his kitties to save to make them look better; the Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home. (repeat).
